hero.subtitle: Transferring the practical & life-based skill mantle to the next generation of future leaders.

about_us_page.why_text: The Mantle Mentorship Programs aims to bring clarity and direction to many young people and professionals on their purpose especially during different academic and professional transition phases in their life based on expert experience from different mentors in the past to help steer the mentees to discover their unique path to their destiny and purpose for the particular season of their life, thereby avoiding costly life and professional mistakes that could be sometimes, irreversible.
about_us_page.benefit_1: Expert guidance from professional experience with successful mentees across all continents.
about_us_page.benefit_2: Tailor-made curriculum for each mentee after one-on-one session to project your future mentorship needs
about_us_page.benefit_3: Experts in transitions management from the different stage in mentees journey
about_us_page.benefit_4: Global network of mentees Alumni across 6 continents.
about_us_page.benefit_5: Discounted access to published mentorship books
about_us_page.benefit_6: Invitation to periodic Mantle Mentorship Alumni Conference where current mentees meet with past mentees and share experiences.
about_us_page.benefit_7: Low commitment fees for the Programs
about_us_page.chief_mentor_bio_1: Ebuka Umeh is a business executive that has over 20 years’ experience providing mentorship to the different age groups and professionals on both professional and life-based matters. His love for mentoring others and providing uncommon direction to mentees had led to serve in much knowledge-based and youth communities including holding roles as a lead and mentor within Google communities between 2018 – 2023.
about_us_page.chief_mentor_bio_2: He has a bachelor degree in engineering and 4 Masters degree that cuts across engineering (Nigeria), economics (France), business management (France) and an Executive MBA from USA. He is an Expert Consultant for Atheneum, Dialectica & Trappetti Group. He provides advisory for the Institution of Engineering & Technology (IET) UK and a non Executive Director at Carina Global Realty.
about_us_page.chief_mentor_bio_3: In 2021, he held a mentorship session called the Young Founders Masterclass geared to young people between 15 – 25 years through Eruptify Academy to provide tutelage on the basic rudiments of setting up a business and scaling for existing businesses for young African youths.
about_us_page.chief_mentor_bio_4: Between 2023 till date, under the platform Youth without Walls (YWY), he conducts an annual mentorship session with youths between 13 – 35 years, providing uncommon knowledge to over 150+ youths in Belgium annually. He has successfully mentored many young people in all the continents of the world. He is involved in many public mentoring speaking events across different cultures.

registration_page.title: Register for
registration_page.subtitle: Begin your journey towards leadership and purpose. Fill out the application below.
registration_page.form_card_desc: Please answer all questions honestly and comprehensively.

questions.program_interest: Which of the Mantle Mentorship Program service offerings would you like to attend?
questions.why_participate: Why do you want to participate in the Mantle Mentorship Program?
questions.expectations: What do you expect to be able to do at the end of the program?
questions.general_program_willingness: Would you be willing to attend the Mantle Mentorship General program planned from 7th March 2026 - 11th April 2026?
questions.limited_slots: Only Limited Slots of 10 Participants (6 Saturdays)
questions.waitlist: If no, would you like to be added on the waiting list and keep you updated?
questions.fee_willingness: The Mantle Mentorship General Program requires a discounted commitment fee of 100 Euros. This can be paid in the accounts below with proof sent to info@mantlementor.com. Are you willing to pay this fee?
questions.willingness_to_attend_next: Would you be willing to attend the  next General Mantle Mentorship Program. We will contact you on the next program as soon as you complete the registration
questions.challenge: What specific challenge or goal are you currently facing that you hope this mentorship program will help you address, and why is now the right time for you to tackle it?
questions.success_metrics: If accepted, what would success look like for you six months after the program ends? How will you measure whether the mentorship was worthwhile?
questions.comments: Any further question, comments or suggestions?
